text: Alan Grant (9 February 194920 July 2022) was a Scottish comic book writer. He was known for writing Judge Dredd and many Batman comic books. He was also known as the co-creator of the characters Anarky, Victor Zsasz, and the Ventriloquist. Grant died on 20 July 2022 at the age of 73.Ãˆ morto Alan Grant, scrittore di Batman, Lobo e Judge Dredd ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Scottish writers Category:People from Midlothian Category:Comics writers
title: Alan Grant
